io.micronaut.starter.lambda

Class CustomMicronautLambdaRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.starter.lambda.CustomMicronautLambdaRuntime

  • public class CustomMicronautLambdaRuntime
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that can be used as a entry point for a custom Lambda runtime.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    graemerocher
